name: Beefy Baked Ravioli
author: Angie Shirk Williams
summary: This recipe is a hit with my husband and everyone else I've given the recipe to.  It's very easy and satisfies that Italian craving.
ingredients: ½ (25 ounce) package frozen cheese ravioli
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Crumble the ground beef into a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir until no longer pink
Drain grease, then stir in the spaghetti sauce and tomatoes
Spread 1/3 of the sauce in the bottom of an 11x7 inch baking dish
Arrange 1/2 of the ravioli over the sauce
Sprinkle 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese and 1/2 of the Monterey Jack cheese over the ravioli
Repeat layers, ending with the last of the sauce on top
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the top before serving
